medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was recently admitted with history of gallstone pancreatitis, choledocholithiasis, and cholangitis, underwent ERCP for stone extraction and sphincteroplasty. Follow-up planned for elective gallbladder removal. The patient had an MRCP that indicated possible ampullary stenosis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Colon cancer s/p partial colectomy, diabetes mellitus type II, possible renal disease, hypertension, asthma, hyperlipidemia, vertigo, chronic pain, BPH, psoriasis, spinal stenosis.
